title: Spoon, 1986-113-10, 1880
markings: On reverse of bowl, stamped: "[lion passant]/[anchor]/ G (Gorham mark)/ STERLING."
description: Oval bowl. Matte gilded obverse and reverse. Edge fluted in shell-like manner. Flat stem tapered toward end. Bright-cut engraved border: centralportion of stem engraved with asymmetrical pattern of overlapping triangleswith large plain section near end of handle. Oval bowl. Matte gilded obverse and reverse. Edge fluted in shell-like manner. Flat stem tapered outwarde toward end. Bright-cut engraved borderwith central panel of stem engraved with asymmetrical pattern of overlapping triangles, with large plain section near end of handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
